title: 求助   装了MOD之后崩溃
author: 周天明
txt_content:
本帖最后由 周天明 于 2019-7-20 21:48 编辑 

               装了MOD之后崩溃



Type: Minecraft Crash
Minecraft已崩溃
---- Minecraft崩溃报告 ----

WARNING: coremods are present:
  IELoadingPlugin (ImmersiveEngineering-core-0.12-89.jar)
  Inventory Tweaks Coremod (InventoryTweaks-1.63.jar)
  CorePlugin (AcademyCraft-1.1.2.jar)
  JechCore (JustEnoughCharacters-1.12.0-3.4.3.jar)
  CoreMod (Aroma1997Core-1.12.2-2.0.0.2.jar)
  DLFMLCorePlugin (DynamicLights-1.12.2.jar)
  ColorUtilityCorePlugin (ColorUtility-universal-1.0.4.jar)
Contact their authors BEFORE contacting forge

// This doesn't make any sense!

Time: 7/19/19 11:23 AM
崩溃类型： There was a severe problem during mod loading that has caused the game to fail

net.minecraftforge.fml.common.LoaderExceptionModCrash: Caught exception from Inventory Tweaks (inventorytweaks)
Caused by: java.lang.NoSuchMethodError: net.minecraft.nbt.NBTTagCompound.setBoolean(Ljava/lang/String;Z)V

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
不全，上传完整的。

或者试着删除 InventoryTweaks-1.63.jar

replies.author: skyliye
replies.txt_content:
更新这个mod：Inventory Tweaks （R键整理）

https://media.forgecdn.net/files ... toryTweaks-1.63.jar

replies.author: mine新时代xs
replies.txt_content:
请上传完整的崩溃报告，只有十分之一的内容鬼知道你咋崩的
请更新你的Forge试试看，若不行，升级或降级你的R键整理

replies.author: 名人九尾
replies.txt_content:
你Java7和Java8都是一下，看看兼容哪个，
如果不行就试着调大运行内存

replies.author: 周天明
replies.txt_content:
skyliye 发表于 2019-7-19 11:45
更新这个mod：Inventory Tweaks （R键整理）

https://media.forgecdn.net/files/2482/481/InventoryTweaks ...
已解绝      多谢
